ErrorIssue.description: Detailed information regarding the issue that was experienced during processing of the request

code.description: Code that uniquely identifies the type of issue

parameter.description: Identfies the parameter / property within the request (headers, query parameters or body) that the issue relates to. For headers and query parameters, it refers to the parameter name. For the body, it refers to the JSONPath of the property

message.description: Human readable description of the issue that was experienced
